Banner.Description: With 6 years of experience in developing scalable systems and intuitive user interfaces, I specialize in building robust web applications using Angular with TypeScript/JavaScript. I am passionate about crafting clean, reusable, and maintainable code, consistently applying industry best practices and modern development standards. My focus is on delivering high-performance, user-centric solutions that enhance functionality and user experience across the web.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I'm a front-end focused developer with 6 years of experience, specializing in Angular, TypeScript, and Javascript building scalable, high-performance UIs. I’ve developed applications using NAG Grid, RxJS, GraphQL (Apollo), and NgRx, with a strong emphasis on clean architecture and responsive design. I ensure reliability through robust unit and E2E testing using Jasmine, Karma, and Cypress.

Alongside front-end expertise, I’ve contributed to backend development with Java (Spring Boot) and worked with both SQL and NoSQL databases. I’ve led teams, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and optimized performance, and built scalable apps using monorepo and Micro Frontend (MFE) architecture. I'm also familiar with React from cross-functional project work.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Sr. Software developer
Description: Developing and managing cybersecurity dashboards using Angular 16, AG Grid, PrimeNG, Spring Boot, and Oracle DB.
Implementing server-side pagination, filtering, and sorting in AG Grid for real-time data handling.
Enhancing threat intelligence analysis, reducing incident response times and improving monitoring.
Built dynamic visualizations with Highcharts and Chart.js deployed on Google App Engine.
Achieved 80%+ test coverage with Jasmine, Karma, and Cypress enabled CI/CD in mono-repo with Module Federation.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Sr. Software Engineer
Description: Led the Account Opening Experience platform with cross-team integration and collaboration.
Built scalable apps using Angular 14, NgRx, AG Grid, and Micro Frontend Architecture (MFE).
Developed reusable components and ensured WCAG AA accessibility compliance.
Integrated Spring Boot APIs with secure data handling and reusable service layers.
Streamlined CI/CD with Jenkins, Docker, OpenShift; followed Agile Scrum for delivery.

Experience.Jobs.Title: UI developer
Description: Developed a social services app connecting neighborhoods with a user-friendly, Uber-like interface.
Built responsive UIs using Angular 2, jQuery, HTML5, and CSS3, based on Zeplin mockups.
Implemented strong input validation, error handling, and security measures.
Improved client websites by fixing bugs, enhancing performance, and deploying security updates.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and led QA testing to ensure a smooth user experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software developer
Description: Built an Android app to scan barcodes and add products to cart for quick checkout.
Handled data with SQLite and managed app logic using Java.
Developed and maintained Java-based components for user interactions.
Ensured responsiveness and functionality of web apps using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.
Conducted testing, debugging, and created mockups to validate functionality.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
